mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `board` SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), memberId = #{memberId}, code = #{code}, `name` = #{name}
mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) FROM `board` WHERE 1
AND `name` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND `code` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND (`name` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%'))
ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT B.*, IFNULL(M.nickname, "탈퇴회원") AS extra__writer FROM `board` AS B LEFT JOIN `member` AS M ON B.memberId = M.id WHERE 1
AND B.'name' LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND B.`code` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND (B.`code` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR B.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%'))
ORDER BY id DESC
LIMIT #{limitStart}, #{limitTake}
